title: please help identify this font
content:
could this be Bodoni?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [22\_cano.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204090958/http:/typophile.com/files/22_cano.jpg) | 71.46 KB |

 [‹ Yale Graphic Design broad nib](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204090958/http:/typophile.com/node/52146 "Go to previous forum topic") [Name that Font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204090958/http:/typophile.com/node/52147 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Arran

comments.content:
It’s not.  
It’s ITC Didi, not available in digital form.
The second serif on that C says it’s not Didoni, unless there’s an alternate. The tail on the a looks right, though.

The second serif on that C says it’s not Didoni because it’s ITC Didi.  
The second serif on that C says it’s not Didoni because it’s ITC Didi.  
The second serif on that C says it’s not Didoni because it’s ITC Didi.  
...
Yeah... Took me awhile to investigate; didn’t see your comment until after. Sorry!

_didn’t see your comment until after. Sorry!_

Yeah... forgetting to refresh happens to all of us. I’m sorry.
I think that might not be Didoni.
